projects.title: Lucid Dream Journal
projects.description: CRUD app for tracking your dreams
projects.meta: React, Bootstrap, Express, NodeJS, MongoDB, Mongoose
info: Built CRUD web app that allows users to keep record of their dreams using Node and Express
Created RESTful APIs that serve data from MongoDB database to React frontend based on user actions
Programmed security features by hashing passwords using bcrypt and implementing JWT Authentication
Developed models by using Mongoose to create schemas and provide data validation
Implemented state management using React Context API to minimize HTTP requests to backend

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: My little corner on the internet
projects.meta: React, MaterialUI, Firebase, CI/CD, JavaScript, HTML, CSS
info: Developed React and Firebase website with CI/CD pipeline for auto-deployments using GitHub Actions
Implemented client-side data validation for contact form before sending to Cloud Firestore database

projects.title: PixArt
projects.meta: Vanilla JavaScript, HTML, CSS - No libraries!
info: Programmed online tool for drawing pixel art using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Integrated event listeners to enable users to manipulate drawing canvas colors, background, and grid

projects.title: Bike Frame & Welding Jig
projects.description: Engineering a bike frame from scratch
info: Project completed during co-op term at UWaterloo as an R&D Engineer Intern

projects.title: Lifecycle Testing Machine
projects.description: Machine for conducting fatigue testing on chairs
info: Project completed during co-op term at UWaterloo as an R&D Engineer Intern
Programmed equipment validation features for learning management system using React
Wrote automation scripts in Python and JavaScript to minify file sizes by an average of 65%
Implemented asynchronous requests to improve loading speeds of 30+ lesson templates
Developed user interface and educational games for iOS/Android application using Flutter and Dart
Integrated RESTful APIs to load JSON user configuration and course data into frontend
Tested software for bugs and operating speed, fixed bugs, and documented processes on Jira
Improved efficiency of utility request process by designing virtual portal used by 9 departments
Automated document approval flow and sign-off requests using Microsoft Power Automate
Saved department $14k/year from external cloud services by implementing cheaper alternative
Collected and analyzed quantitative data to create financial and energy models of potential facility installations
Developed countermeasures to reduce 74% of chilled water production expenses using cost-benefit analysis
Presented chilled water production project to senior management using Toyota Business Practice problem-solving model
Built lifecycle chair testing machine by programming and wiring automation controls using Arduino
Led the design, construction, and analysis of steel bike frame and welding jig from scratch
Performed finite-element analysis on bike frame to ensure safety factor above 3
Created bottleneck simulator in collaboration with Management Sciences for students to explore productivity principles
